definition: a very short time (as the time it takes the eye to blink or the heart to beat), hoist up or in and lash or secure with a small rope
details:
noun
- a very short time (as the time it takes the eye to blink or the heart to beat)
= synonyms: wink
verb
- hoist up or in and lash or secure with a small rope
= synonyms: trice up
- raise with a line
= example: raise with a line
= synonyms: trice up
